blogPost.excerpt: Want to replace annoying SMS 2FA codes? We verify your users by the way they type 4 words. This improves UX significantly and reduces costs by an order of magnitude. Btw: you can get the solution free of charge for a limited time. Check the website for more.
blogPost.body: Want to replace annoying SMS 2FA codes? We verify your users by the way they type 4 words. This improves UX significantly and reduces costs by an order of magnitude. Btw: you can get the solution free of charge for a limited time. Check the website for more.
blogPost.title: TypingDNA Verify - Replace SMS 2FA codes with better UX: just type 4 words
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 想取代恼人的短信2FA码？我们通过用户输入4个字的方式来验证你的用户。这大大改善了用户体验，并将成本降低了一个数量级。顺便说一下：您可以在有限的时间内免费获得该解决方案。查看网站了解更多。
localize.tagline: 用更好的用户体验取代短信2FA码：只需输入4个字即可。

localize.description: 想取代惱人的短信2FA碼？我們通過用戶輸入4個字的方式來驗證你的用戶。這大大改善了用戶體驗，並將成本降低了一個數量級。順便說一下：您可以在有限的時間內免費獲得該解決方案。查看網站了解更多。
localize.tagline: 用更好的用戶體驗取代短信2FA碼：只需輸入4個字即可。

localize.tagline: 看看哪些工具正在为最好的D2C提供动力。

next.excerpt: Start creating your app with clean mind and clear representing of screen structure. There are 12 device mockups in the pack, for both iPhone and Android. Carefully created A4 format templates that perfectly repeat the real device sizes. PNG, JPG, PDF formats.
next.title: Printables - Free printable templates for your mobile sketching

localize.description: 以简洁的思维和清晰的画面结构开始创建你的应用程序。套件中共有12个设备模拟图，适用于iPhone和Android。精心制作的A4格式模板，完美地重复了真实设备的尺寸。PNG, JPG, PDF格式。
localize.tagline: 免费打印模板，为您的手机画草图服务

localize.description: 以簡潔的思維和清晰的畫面結構開始創建你的應用程序。套件中共有12個設備模擬圖，適用於iPhone和Android。精心製作的A4格式模板，完美地重複了真實設備的尺寸。PNG, JPG, PDF格式。
localize.tagline: 免費打印模板，爲您的手機畫草圖服務
